main.name: Victor Yap
main.occupation: Based in Singapore, learning to be a full Stack developer
main.description: I enjoy creating websites and moblie apps. I am also comfortable with backend database such as SQL Server
main.bio: I was first introduced to web and mobile development by a friend in 2015 and I became fascinated by the potential of technology. Soon after, I decided to delve head-first into web development by attending NUS ISSâ€™s course where the instructors and community helped me cultivate a strong foundation and supplement my knowledge.

education.description: The Graduate Diploma in Systems Analysis programme (GDipSA) is designed for non-IT graduates intending to craft a new career path in the IT industry.
Major: Business Administration, Concentration: Financial Analysis

work.title: Consultant
work.description: Analyse process/ program specifications & translate specifications to program code, conforming to program guidelines and programming best practices.
work.workdetail1: Develop unit test package, execute tests & document test results
work.workdetail2: Assist in the integration testing, system testing, investigate all errors, maintain documentation
work.workdetail3: Work with team to ensure design and programmme codes to architecture and design standards

work.title: Software Developer Internship
work.description: InHi Travel is a mobile app that provides customers with latest and accurate travel information about Singapore. My primary job responsibility is to develop the back-end to support the iOS app.
work.workdetail1: Help user to save time by plotting the shortest route for the list of destination they are going using Google API
work.workdetail2: After user searched for the attraction, they can easily purchase the ticket for the attraction via the app. The tickets are obtained from a 3rd party API known as GlobalTix.
work.workdetail3: Upon buying the ticket they can easily make their payment via WePay, a popular payment platform in China

accomplishment.title: Native Sun Competition (University at Buffalo)
accomplishment.description: Operation and Production Case Study: You are an Associate Producer for Convex Productions, a feature film production company. Executive Producer has just purchased the rights to film a script entitled Native Sun , and needs you to draw up an approximate filming schedule. You have a total of 73 tasks to coordinate into a rough-cut filming plan for the project Native Sun
accomplishment.detail1: One issue of importance in project scheduling is precedence relationships between tasks. Precedence relationships dictate which tasks in a project absolutely must be finished before some other task can be started.
accomplishment.detail2: Each film scene has different location, duration, actor, precedence relationships and cost
accomplishment.detail3: Compete with over 500 students and won the 1st place in the following categories: Feasible Schedule that completes this project in the Least Amount of Time, Feasible Schedule that requires the Least Amount of Money, Feasible Schedule that requires the Least Amount of Money Including a $75,000 per Day of Schedule Overhead Charge

accomplishment.title: Fine Wine Rack Competition (University at Buffalo)
accomplishment.description: Operation and Production Case Study: As Production Manager of the Fine Wine Rack Co., you supervise a small factory that builds custom bottle storage systems.
accomplishment.detail1: You currently have four crew members staffing the factory: Juan Vasquez (senior employee and master carpenter), Debbie Bates, Mike Parker (the son of your boss, Ben Parker), and Stan (The Man) Reeves. Your job as Production Manager is to schedule the activities of these four employees, as well as keep them supplied with whatever materials they may need.
accomplishment.detail2: Each job has different rack, supplies and schedule
accomplishment.detail3: Compete with over 500 students and won the 1st place in the following categories: Highest Profit Schedule that completes this project

others.title: Leadership, NUS-ISS Class Representative (SA42)
others.description: Act as a liaison between the students and the lecturers. Ensure that my classmates are properly represented and completely informed.
others.othersdetail1: Informing my classmate(China, India, Myanmar..) the latest update and news
others.othersdetail2: Organize & host a game section for SA42 and SA43, allow the juniors and senior to know more about each other.
others.othersdetail3: Organize & host a BBQ session for SA42, allow everyone to discuss about their internship experiences with each other.
